original_text: Haran died in the presence of his father Terah in the land of his kindred, in Ur of the Chaldeans.
korean_text: 하란은 그 아비 데라보다 먼저 고향 갈대아인의 우르에서 죽었더라

sentences.original_text: in the presence of his father Terah
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지 데라가 살아 계실 때

sentences.original_text: in the land of his kindred
